alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 8:08PM EDT until July 19 at 6:49AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Floodwaters surround homes and roads in the Riverside Park Drive community off Pinewood Road in Allenstown. Water up to Jasper Drive, Bourge Roads, and Albin Avenue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM EDT Sunday was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is cresting this evening. The river is expected to fall below flood stage Tuesday morning and continue falling to 5.2 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
